CT Learn

High

Unlike other Visual Learning Environments, CTlearn User Interface (UI) is simplified making it easier to navigate the system thereby helping those with low IT knowledge to use the platform without series of training. Being a decentralized Visual Learning Environment (VLE) will help solve the learning cultural differences that exist within our schools and Higher Institutions. CTlearn User Interface (UI) makes it easier for teachers with lower IT skills to easily navigate within the entire system without undergoing several training on how to use CTlearn.

Role: Mobile Developer

Forextainment

Medium

Forextainment is a fast, social-first Flutter app with real-time community engagement. It blends a clean, modern UI with Firebase speed and reliability to deliver posts, comments, reposts, likes, and saves that feel instant and seamless across platforms. Features: - Real-time social feed - Guest mode - Email verification flow - Optimistic UI updates, infinite scroll, and responsive UX - Robust Firebase security rules for granular permissions - Admin broadcast messages and in-app announcements - Pagination for performance

Role: Lead Frontend Engineer

Ahiaoma Seller

High

This is a production-ready Flutter app enabling marketplace resellers to manage products and orders efficiently. - Backend: Supabase (auth, profiles, storage, real-time) - State management: Provider with a clean, modular architecture - Notifications: OneSignal + flutter_local_notifications (push & local) - Deep links: password reset and other routed flows - Security: secure persistence via encrypted storage - UI: responsive layouts with ScreenUtil - Delivery: iOS & Android ready, env-driven config with dotenv
